title: Saving password in internal browser
author: SMylk
body_snippet:
Is it possible to save the password when using the HTTPS protocol (browser)?
Thinking mainly for citrix sites.

iterations.description: Current implementation isolates sessions with temporary user data folders, preventing password saving; a new option is needed to enable persistence.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Current implementation isolates sessions with temporary user data folders, preventing password saving; a new option is needed to enable persistence.
Approach: Add 'UsePersistentBrowser' property to ConnectionInfo. In HTTPBase, if enabled, use a stable user data folder (e.g., %AppData%/mRemoteNG/BrowserProfiles/{ConnectionID}) and skip cleanup on close.
